name: Kristen Camacho
bio: Kristen has been a member of the entertainment industry for over 12 years playing an integral role in the success in a vast variety of committees such as Fantasy & Entice Carnival, Sundeck, SHE Events, Initiate Novelty, Dream and KK creative, just to name a few.

name: Lurbz
bio: Lurbz has been an entertainer for 10 years best known for his role as a Radio Announcer for Slam 100.5FM and TV hosting on Synergy TV. Lurbz has also had an influence in the partying industry being partially responsible for the success of parties such as Rosscos, Residence, Havoc and Sunblock. No short of a well rounded entertainer Lurbz has been recognized for his emcee work both Regionally and Internationally.

name: Angelo Aziz
bio: Angelo has been in the etertainment industry for over 10 years. He has been a member of numerous successful committees such as, Bayside, Elements, Havoc, Sunblock, Drunch, Focus, WaterGames, Energy Section in Bliss and One Night Only.

name: Kwame Robertson
bio: Kwame has been a part of the Fantasy & Entice Carnical, Krisp Events, Initiate Novelty and KK Creative, just to name a few of the well established committees he's served over the last 10 years.
